verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, When <S%H3588><s%> ye come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you, then shall the land <S%H776><s%> keep <S%H7673><s%> a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt sow <S%H2232><s%> thy field, <S%H7704><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt prune <S%H2168><s%> thy vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and gather in <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fruit <S%H8393><s%> thereof;

But in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%> unto the land, <S%H776><s%> a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> for the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> thou shalt neither <S%H3808><s%> sow <S%H2232><s%> thy field, <S%H7704><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> prune <S%H2168><s%> thy vineyard. <S%H3754><s%>

<S%H853><s%> That which groweth of its own accord <S%H5599><s%> of thy harvest <S%H7105><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> reap, <S%H7114><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> gather <S%H1219><s%> the grapes <S%H6025><s%> of thy vine undressed: <S%H5139><s%> for it is <S%H1961><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> of rest <S%H7677><s%> unto the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> meat <S%H402><s%> for you; for thee, and for thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> and for thy maid, <S%H519><s%> and for thy hired servant, <S%H7916><s%> and for thy stranger <S%H8453><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee,

And for thy cattle, <S%H929><s%> and for the beast <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in thy land, <S%H776><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the increase <S%H8393><s%> thereof be <S%H1961><s%> meat. <S%H398><s%>

And thou shalt number <S%H5608><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> unto thee, seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and the space <S%H3117><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto thee forty <S%H705><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

Then shalt thou cause the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> of the jubilee <S%H8643><s%> to sound <S%H5674><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%> shall ye make the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> sound <S%H5674><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> your land. <S%H776><s%>

And ye shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fiftieth <S%H2572><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof: it <S%H1931><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a jubilee <S%H3104><s%> unto you; and ye shall return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his possession, <S%H272><s%> and ye shall return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his family. <S%H4940><s%>

A jubilee <S%H3104><s%> shall that <S%H1931><s%> fiftieth <S%H2572><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> unto you: ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> sow, <S%H2232><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> reap <S%H7114><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which groweth of itself <S%H5599><s%> in it, nor <S%H3808><s%> gather <S%H1219><s%> the grapes in it <S%H853><s%> of thy vine undressed. <S%H5139><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the jubilee; <S%H3104><s%> it shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> unto you: ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the increase <S%H8393><s%> thereof out of <S%H4480><s%> the field. <S%H7704><s%>
In the year <S%H8141><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> jubilee <S%H3104><s%> ye shall return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his possession. <S%H272><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> thou sell <S%H4376><s%> aught <S%H4465><s%> unto thy neighbor, <S%H5997><s%> or <S%H176><s%> buyest <S%H7069><s%> aught of thy neighbor's hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5997><s%> ye shall not <S%H408><s%> oppress <S%H3238><s%> one <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> another: <S%H251><s%>

According to the number <S%H4557><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the jubilee <S%H3104><s%> thou shalt buy <S%H7069><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> thy neighbor, <S%H5997><s%> and according unto the number <S%H4557><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> of the fruits <S%H8393><s%> he shall sell <S%H4376><s%> unto thee:

According to <S%H6310><s%> the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt increase <S%H7235><s%> the price <S%H4736><s%> thereof, and according to <S%H6310><s%> the fewness <S%H4591><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt diminish <S%H4591><s%> the price <S%H4736><s%> of it: for <S%H3588><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the years of the fruits <S%H8393><s%> doth he <S%H1931><s%> sell <S%H4376><s%> unto thee.

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> therefore oppress <S%H3238><s%> <S%H853><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another; <S%H5997><s%> but thou shalt fear thy God: <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Wherefore ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them; and ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>

And the land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> your fill, <S%H7648><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H5921><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> ye shall say, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall we eat <S%H398><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year? <S%H8141><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> we shall not <S%H3808><s%> sow, <S%H2232><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> gather in <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> our increase: <S%H8393><s%>

Then I will command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> my blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon you in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and it shall bring forth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> fruit <S%H8393><s%> for three <S%H7969><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And ye shall sow <S%H2232><s%> the <S%H853><s%> eighth <S%H8066><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> yet of <S%H4480><s%> old <S%H3465><s%> fruit <S%H8393><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the ninth <S%H8671><s%> year; <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> her fruits <S%H8393><s%> come in <S%H935><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> of the old <S%H3465><s%> store.

The land <S%H776><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be sold <S%H4376><s%> forever: <S%H6783><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is mine; for <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are strangers <S%H1616><s%> and sojourners <S%H8453><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me.
And in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%> ye shall grant <S%H5414><s%> a redemption <S%H1353><s%> for the land. <S%H776><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> be waxen poor, <S%H4134><s%> and hath sold away <S%H4376><s%> some of his possession, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H272><s%> and if any of his kin <S%H7138><s%> <S%H413><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to redeem <S%H1350><s%> it, then shall he redeem <S%H1350><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which his brother sold. <S%H4465><s%> <S%H251><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> none to redeem <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1350><s%> it, and himself <S%H5381><s%> <S%H3027><s%> be able <S%H4672><s%> <S%H1767><s%> to redeem <S%H1353><s%> it;

Then let him count <S%H2803><s%> <S%H853><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of the sale <S%H4465><s%> thereof, and restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the surplus <S%H5736><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> he sold <S%H4376><s%> it; that he may return <S%H7725><s%> unto his possession. <S%H272><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> he <S%H3027><s%> be not able <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4672><s%> <S%H1767><s%> to restore <S%H7725><s%> it to him, then that which is sold <S%H4465><s%> shall remain <S%H1961><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him that hath bought <S%H7069><s%> it until <S%H5704><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of jubilee: <S%H3104><s%> and in the jubilee <S%H3104><s%> it shall go out, <S%H3318><s%> and he shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto his possession. <S%H272><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> sell <S%H4376><s%> a dwelling <S%H4186><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in a walled <S%H2346><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> then he may redeem <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1353><s%> it within <S%H5704><s%> a whole <S%H8552><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after it is sold; <S%H4465><s%> within a full year <S%H3117><s%> may he redeem <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1353><s%> it.

And if <S%H518><s%> it be not <S%H3808><s%> redeemed <S%H1350><s%> within <S%H5704><s%> the space <S%H4390><s%> of a full <S%H8549><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> then the house <S%H1004><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the walled <S%H834><s%> <S%H2346><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> shall be established <S%H6965><s%> forever <S%H6783><s%> to him that bought <S%H7069><s%> it throughout his generations: <S%H1755><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> in the jubilee. <S%H3104><s%>

But the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the villages <S%H2691><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have no <S%H369><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them shall be counted <S%H2803><s%> as <S%H5921><s%> the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the country: <S%H776><s%> they may be <S%H1961><s%> redeemed, <S%H1353><s%> and they shall go out <S%H3318><s%> in the jubilee. <S%H3104><s%>

Notwithstanding the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of their possession, <S%H272><s%> may the Levites <S%H3881><s%> redeem <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1353><s%> at any time. <S%H5769><s%>

And if a man <S%H834><s%> purchase <S%H1350><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> then the house <S%H1004><s%> that was sold, <S%H4465><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> of his possession, <S%H272><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> in the year of jubilee: <S%H3104><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> are their possession <S%H272><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

But the field <S%H7704><s%> of the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of their cities <S%H5892><s%> may not <S%H3808><s%> be sold; <S%H4376><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is their perpetual <S%H5769><s%> possession. <S%H272><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> be waxen poor, <S%H4134><s%> and fallen in decay <S%H4131><s%> <S%H3027><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee; then thou shalt relieve <S%H2388><s%> him: yea, though he be a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> or a sojourner; <S%H8453><s%> that he may live <S%H2421><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou no <S%H408><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> him, or increase: <S%H8636><s%> but fear thy God; <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> that thy brother <S%H251><s%> may live <S%H2421><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> him <S%H853><s%> thy money <S%H3701><s%> upon usury, <S%H5392><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> lend <S%H5414><s%> him thy victuals <S%H400><s%> for increase. <S%H4768><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and to be <S%H1961><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> that dwelleth by <S%H5973><s%> thee be waxen poor, <S%H4134><s%> and be sold <S%H4376><s%> unto thee; thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> compel him to serve <S%H5647><s%> as a bondservant: <S%H5656><s%> <S%H5650><s%>

But as a hired servant, <S%H7916><s%> and as a sojourner, <S%H8453><s%> he shall be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, and shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee unto <S%H5704><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of jubilee: <S%H3104><s%>

And then shall he depart <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee, both he <S%H1931><s%> and his children <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, and shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his own family, <S%H4940><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%> shall he return. <S%H7725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are my servants, <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be sold <S%H4376><s%> as bondmen. <S%H4466><s%> <S%H5650><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> rule <S%H7287><s%> over him with rigor; <S%H6531><s%> but shalt fear thy God. <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%>

Both thy bondmen, <S%H5650><s%> and thy bondmaids, <S%H519><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt have, <S%H1961><s%> shall be of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> you; of <S%H4480><s%> them shall ye buy <S%H7069><s%> bondmen <S%H5650><s%> and bondmaids. <S%H519><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the strangers <S%H8453><s%> that do sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> you, of <S%H4480><s%> them shall ye buy, <S%H7069><s%> and of their families <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are with <S%H5973><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> they begot <S%H3205><s%> in your land: <S%H776><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> your possession. <S%H272><s%>

And ye shall take them as an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> for your children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, to inherit <S%H3423><s%> them for a possession; <S%H272><s%> they shall be your bondmen <S%H5647><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> but over your brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> rule <S%H7287><s%> one <S%H376><s%> over another <S%H251><s%> with rigor. <S%H6531><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a sojourner <S%H3027><s%> <S%H1616><s%> or stranger <S%H8453><s%> wax rich <S%H5381><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> thee, and thy brother <S%H251><s%> that dwelleth by <S%H5973><s%> him wax poor, <S%H4134><s%> and sell himself <S%H4376><s%> unto the stranger <S%H1616><s%> or sojourner <S%H8453><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> thee, or <S%H176><s%> to the stock <S%H6133><s%> of the stranger's <S%H1616><s%> family: <S%H4940><s%>
After that <S%H310><s%> he is sold <S%H4376><s%> he may be <S%H1961><s%> redeemed again; <S%H1353><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his brethren <S%H4480><s%> <S%H251><s%> may redeem <S%H1350><s%> him:

Either <S%H176><s%> his uncle, <S%H1730><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his uncle's <S%H1730><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> may redeem <S%H1350><s%> him, or <S%H176><s%> any that is nigh <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7607><s%> of kin <S%H1320><s%> unto him of his family <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> may redeem <S%H1350><s%> him; or <S%H176><s%> if he be able, <S%H5381><s%> <S%H3027><s%> he may redeem himself. <S%H1350><s%>

And he shall reckon <S%H2803><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him that bought <S%H7069><s%> him from the year <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8141><s%> that he was sold <S%H4376><s%> to him unto <S%H5704><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of jubilee: <S%H3104><s%> and the price <S%H3701><s%> of his sale <S%H4465><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> according unto the number <S%H4557><s%> of years, <S%H8141><s%> according to the time <S%H3117><s%> of a hired servant <S%H7916><s%> shall it be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.

If <S%H518><s%> there be yet <S%H5750><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> behind, according unto <S%H6310><s%> them he shall give again <S%H7725><s%> the price of his redemption <S%H1353><s%> out of the money <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3701><s%> that he was bought <S%H4736><s%> for.
